Texts.Chs: 有传言称，肉源世界不是单独的实体，而是散布在整个宇宙中的单一实体的一部分。如果这是真的，那么这样一个存在会有多大？它的目的是什么？
Texts.Eng: There are rumors that Atropus worlds are not individual entities, but rather, parts of a singular one scattered throughout the cosmos. If this were true, how unimaginably vast would such a being be? What would its purpose be?
